description: This column is about uniquely identifying each notification in the system.

examples: Your subscription has been renewed successfully
New feature alert: Personalized recommendations now available
Important: Update your payment information now
Reminder: Payment for subscription due tomorrow
Your account has been upgraded to Premium
Unlock exclusive content with your subscription
Notification: Changes to our Terms of Service
Payment failed: Please update your payment method
Congratulations! You've earned a loyalty reward
Your trial period ends in 3 days
Limited time offer: 50% off your subscription
Your payment for the month of October is due
New course added to your subscription library
Notification: System update required for security
Payment declined: Please check your payment details
Earn bonus points with each subscription payment
description: This column is about storing the titles of notifications related to user subscriptions and payments.

examples: New video uploaded in Science category
Your subscription to Music category has expired
Reminder: Upcoming webinar on Technology Trends
Special offer for Premium subscribers - Limited time only!
Important update: Changes to your subscription plan
Congratulations! You have won a prize in our lucky draw
New article published in Health and Wellness section
Weekly newsletter: Top stories from Entertainment world
Featured course now available for Cooking enthusiasts
Your access to Sports category has been renewed
Customize your notification settings for better experience
Exciting event coming up: Book your spot now!
Stay informed: Trending topics in the community
Discount alert: Get 20% off on selected subscriptions
Join our survey and get a chance to win exciting rewards
Explore new opportunities with our career guidance series
Reminder: Don't miss the live session with industry experts
Upgrade your subscription to unlock exclusive content
New podcast episode released on popular series
Your feedback matters: Share your thoughts with us
description: This column is about storing the description of notifications related to user subscriptions in the public schema.
This column is about storing the unique identifier for each payment method in the system.
This column is about storing the name of the payment method used by the user for their subscription payments.
This column is about storing the payment method number associated with a user's payment method for managing user subscriptions and payments.
This column is about uniquely identifying each subscription in the system.
This column is about storing the names of user subscriptions in the system.
This column is about identifying the unique identifier for each subscription period in the system.
This column is about storing unique identifiers for each user in the system.
This column is about storing the email address of the user.
This column is about storing images associated with each user in the system.

This column is used to store the unique identifier of the clerk associated with the user. It is used to link users to the clerks who are managing their subscriptions and payments, as well as handling notifications related to subscriptions.
This column is about storing the first name of the user.
This column is about storing the last name of a user in the public user table.
This column is about tracking the version of the schema migrations in Supabase for managing user subscriptions and payments, as well as handling notifications related to subscriptions.

examples: CREATE TABLE subscriptions (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT REFERENCES users(id), plan_id INT REFERENCES plans(id), start_date DATE, end_date DATE)
ALTER TABLE subscriptions ADD COLUMN is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
INSERT INTO subscriptions (user_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 2, '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31')
UPDATE subscriptions SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE id = 5
ALTER TABLE subscriptions RENAME COLUMN start_date TO subscription_start_date
CREATE TABLE plans (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10, 2))
ALTER TABLE plans ADD COLUMN description TEXT
UPDATE plans SET price = 129.99 WHERE id = 3
ALTER TABLE plans RENAME TO subscription_plans
CREATE TABLE notifications (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, subscription_id INT REFERENCES subscriptions(id), message TEXT, sent_at TIMESTAMP)
ALTER TABLE notifications ADD COLUMN is_read BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
INSERT INTO notifications (subscription_id, message, sent_at) VALUES (5, 'Your subscription will expire soon', '2023-11-15 08:00:00')
UPDATE notifications SET is_read = TRUE WHERE id = 10
description: This column is about storing the SQL statements executed during the migration process for managing user subscriptions and payments, as well as handling notifications related to subscriptions.
This column is about storing the names of schema migrations in Supabase for managing the database schema changes related to the project.
